citations.narrative:
*** A section of wire mesh in the far corner of one outdoor run housing four puppies is in disrepair. The wire is broken in a
few places and curling upward into the enclosure with some sharp edges. This section of wire needs to be addressed and
kept in good repair for the safety of the dogs.
Correct by: April 30, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.1(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
*** A section of wire mesh in the far corner of one outdoor run housing four puppies is in disrepair. The wire is broken in a 
few places and curling upward into the enclosure with some sharp edges. This section of wire needs to be addressed and 
kept in good repair for the safety of the dogs. 
 
Correct by: April 30, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
